title: Loft der Zotheid
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Bakery, European, Dutch, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers small plates, and has Dutch weedburger which is organic and vegan made from seaweed. Ask your server if kitchen would make the veggie dishes vegan. On Mondays and Tuesdays only the daily special is availabe (has a vegetarian option; vegans need to make special request).
